_header: O fair madame if so ye dare not lo
_description: Charles d’Orléans, Verses asking mistress to love him ‘in spite of daunger and his affynyte’ — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
O fayre madame if so ye dare not looOn lovyng basse as forto geven
                    me…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…And fynde therto a space of suche leysereIn spite of
                    daungere and his affynyte
